name: 恐怖的
mutagen_message: 另一只眼睛在你的思维中打开。
//: iv_message: You feel the stars overtaking you.

name: 乳牛女仆
mutagen_message: 你有一种想哞哞叫渴望。
//: iv_message: Where is your master? You need to be milked.

name: 女仆
mutagen_message: 你的身体为一段主仆关系而滚滚发烫。
//: iv_message: I can feel my body being remade. Surely now I can serve you better.
